name: Jungle Parrot Shooter Prototype
description:
Where the jungle is abundant, local tribes have one great desire: parrot feathers. A FPS mini game in development where you shoot parrots (cubes) with blow darts collecting points, and their famous feathers.

Controls

-Left click to shoot dart

Game features

-Blowpipe rotates and points towards screen position cursor

-Score system

-Spawning system of parrots with varying probability of spawning

-Feathers drop chance also have differing probability created through random number generator using action events and inheritance.

-Pixel Feathers drawn in Photoshop.

-Development used GitHub version control.

Future plans:

-Implement timer into the game

-Object pooling of darts

-Create a final score board which converts points to coin total.

-Create Parrot Assets which animate at random points

- Implement spawn Manager to operate automatically over differing rates.

- Create changeable setting to vary crosshair target.
